name: export pdf scene
desc: Export EVS scenes with vector output of 3D models for the C Tech PDF Converter.

properties.name: Include Preview Image
properties.desc: When selected, a preview image is written into the CTWS file for easier display while file browsing in Windows Explorer and EVS.

properties.name: Texture Format
properties.desc: The Texture Format options control out textures are compressed. Large textures can be compressed as JPEG files for smaller size, or forced to PNG for best quality.

properties.name: JPEG Quality
properties.desc: The JPEG Quality value affects the (*.jpg) output files. Higher qualities result in less LOSS to the image but create much larger files.

properties.name: Author
properties.desc: The Author field allows the user to set the author name on the output scene.

properties.name: Organization
properties.desc: The Organization field allows the user to set the organization name on the output scene.

properties.name: Description
properties.desc: The Description field allows the user to set the description in the output scene.

properties.name: Restrictions
properties.desc: The Restrictions field allows the user to set the restrictions displayed in the output scene.

properties.name: Project
properties.desc: The Project field allows the user to set the project displayed in the output scene.

properties.name: Status
properties.desc: The Restrictions field allows the user to set the status displayed in the output scene.
